faq-one-title: How to contact with Customer Service?
faq-one-content: Our Customer Experience Team is available 7 days a week and we offer 3 ways to get in contact. Email, Call and Chat . We try to reply quickly, so you need not to wait too long for a response!.
faq-two-title: Website response taking time, how to improve?
faq-two-content: At first, Please check your internet connection . We also have some online video tutorials regarding this issue . If the problem remains, Please Open a ticket in the support forum.
